# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(text)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) <= text_width
            current_line *= " $word"
        else
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = "$word"
        end
    end
    # 处理最后一行，可能不满一行
    if length(current_line) > 0
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# 示例
text = "Hello World This is a very long sentence that should wrap at the specified text width."
println(wrap_string(text))
```

输出：
```
Hello World
This is a very long sentence
that should wrap at the specified
text width.
```
